title: Brazil Leads Crypto ETF Race With New Hybrid Bitcoin/Gold Product
description: Hashdex and Buena Vista Capital are teaming up to launch a hybrid bitcoin and gold ETF, reinforcing Brazil's status as a global leader in crypto capital markets
